skipPackageJson.description: Do not add add Essential JS 2 Angular packages dependencies to package.json (e.g., --skipPackageJson)

modules.description: Add only specific Essential JS 2 modules to the app.module file (eg: --moduleName=slider, grid)

modulePath.description: Used to specify the path of the module file where the EJ2 module needs to be imported

theme.description: Used to change the theme that needs to be imported
